Name: GRAVITY SHIFTER
About the game: Travel through 3D space as an astronaut and take a journey in a zero gravity field. Dodge asteroids and use your WASD keys on your keyboard to guide your way through space. Listen to the music and follow the satellites and watch out for speeding asteroids. Loads of fun for people that love space!
